title: Early Morning Oven Roasted New Potatoes

content.text: 1 1/2 pounds new potatoes, cut into wedges
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 1/2 pounds new potatoes, cut into wedges" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "450 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "230 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a hot skillet, melt the butter.
2) Stir in rosemary, salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "rosemary"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@21:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pepper"@30:36 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Coat potatoes evenly with the melted butter.
4) Arrange the potatoes in a single layer on a baking pan.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the potatoes"@11:23 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "a baking pan"@45:57 / TOOL )
		:todo ( "a single layer"@27:41 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Bake in a preheated oven until potatoes are golden brown, approximately 20 to 25 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a preheated oven"@11:27 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until potatoes are golden brown"@28:59 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "approximately 20 to 25 minutes"@61:91 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Toss them occasionally to ensure that they brown on all sides.
